name: SSF8
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 8
subtitle: Gene Expression Profile
notes: **Note**:  Primary uveal melanomas cluster into two distinct molecular classes based on gene expression profile, class 1 (low-grade) and class 2 (high-grade).  Record the information as stated in the medical record.
